# Blink Display
Use the micro:bit display to blink the LEDs on and off.

## How it works
- An array of integers defines brightness of each LED on micro:bit
- An infinite loop keeps the micro:bit blinking forever
- Alternate between printing the image and clearing the display, with a small delay in between

# Blink GPIO

Use GPIO control to blink the micro:bit display
